scripts.build: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node cdc-initializer/build/build.js
scripts.deploy: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-initializer/build/build.js && node cdc-initializer/deploy/deploy.js
scripts.start: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-initializer/build/build.js && light-server -c .lightserverrc
